text: The fiery flying serpent is a snake creature mentioned in the Hebrew Bible (Book of Isaiah, the Book of Numbers, etc.). In biology it is the Echis coloratus (saw-scale viper). == Name == "Fiery flying serpent" is an English translation of the Hebrew words , shārāp (a "fiery serpent") me‘ōpêp ("flying").Hebrew Text Analysis: Isaiah 14:29. Biblehub ==References== Category:Legendary creatures Category:Hebrew Bible Category:Snakes
title: Fiery flying serpent
